trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert <xref:System.Boolean> objects to and from various other representations.
trans-unit.target: Gir et typen konverteringsprogram til å konvertere <xref:System.Boolean>objekter til og fra ulike representasjoner.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Boolean> object to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringsprogram kan bare konvertere en <xref:System.Boolean>objektet til og fra en streng.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om typen konverteringsprogrammer i <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>basisklasse og [slik: implementere et konverteringsprogram av typen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of a BooleanConverter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du aldri må opprette en forekomst av en BooleanConverter.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
trans-unit.target: I stedet kalle <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>metoden for <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>klasse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se eksemplene i <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>basistabellen klasse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.BooleanConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.BooleanConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a Boolean object using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om denne konverteringsprogram kan konvertere et objekt i den angitte kildetypen til et boolsk objekt med den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a Boolean object to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringsprogram kan bare konvertere et boolsk-objekt til og fra en streng.

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: Den `context` parameter kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være `null`, så kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Også egenskapene context-objektet kan returnere `null`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen du vil konvertere fra.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dette objektet kan utføre konverteringen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value object to a Boolean object.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer gitt verdi-objekt til et boolsk objekt.

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a Boolean object to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringsprogram kan bare konvertere et boolsk-objekt til og fra en streng.

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: Den `context` parameter kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være `null`, så kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Også egenskapene context-objektet kan returnere `null`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture to which to convert.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>som angir kulturen som skal konverteres.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>til å konvertere.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: En som representerer det konverterte value .

trans-unit.source: value is not a valid value for the target type.
trans-unit.target: valueer ikke en gyldig verdi for måltypen.

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringen kan ikke utføres.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of standard values for the Boolean data type.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av standardverdier for datatypen Boolean.

trans-unit.source: The Boolean data type has two standard values, `true` and `false`.
trans-unit.target: Datatypen Boolean har to standardverdier `true` og `false`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that holds a standard set of valid values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>som inneholder et standard sett med gyldige verdier.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list of standard values returned from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BooleanConverter.GetStandardValues*> method is an exclusive list.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om listen over standard verdier skal returneres fra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.BooleanConverter.GetStandardValues*>metoden er en spesiell liste.</xref:System.ComponentModel.BooleanConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: The Boolean data type has only two standard values, `true` and `false`.
trans-unit.target: Datatypen Boolean har bare to standardverdier `true` og `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from this method has all possible values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>returnert fra denne metoden har alle mulige verdier.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this method always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Derfor denne metoden returnerer alltid `true`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.BooleanConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exhaustive list of possible values.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>fordi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>returnert fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.BooleanConverter.GetStandardValues*>er en fullstendig liste over mulige verdier.</xref:System.ComponentModel.BooleanConverter.GetStandardValues*> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: This method never returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer aldri <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om dette objektet støtter et standard sett med verdier som kan velges fra en liste.

trans-unit.source: The Boolean data type supports standard values, because a Boolean can only be `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: Datatypen Boolean støtter standardverdier, fordi en boolsk verdi kan bare være `true` eller `false`.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this method always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Derfor denne metoden returnerer alltid `true`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> because <xref:System.ComponentModel.BooleanConverter.GetStandardValues*> can be called to find a common set of values the object supports.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>fordi <xref:System.ComponentModel.BooleanConverter.GetStandardValues*>kan kalles for å finne et vanlig sett med verdier objektet støtter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.BooleanConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: This method never returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer aldri <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
